Title: Andrew Vaughn is looking to make the leap from Class A to the Chicago White Sox designated hitter job — though Tony La Russa cautions, ‘He’s in pencil,’ not ink
Description: Tony La Russa has noticed that when Andrew Vaughn comes to bat, he’s ready to do damage. “He’s got that hitter-ish attitude,” the Chicago White Sox manager said during a Tuesday conference call. La Russa also noted that Vaughn,
Author: Chicago Tribune on MSN.com
